00034 {
00035 public:
00039     ClockTimer()
00040     : start_(boost::posix_time::microsec_clock::local_time())
00041     {}
00042 
00046     void restart()
00047     {
00048         start_ = boost::posix_time::microsec_clock::local_time();
00049     }
00050 
00057     double elapsed() const
00058     {
00059         boost::posix_time::time_duration td =
00060             boost::posix_time::microsec_clock::local_time() -
00061             start_;
00062 
00063         return static_cast<double>(td.fractional_seconds()) /
00064             boost::posix_time::time_duration::ticks_per_second()
00065             + td.total_seconds();
00066     }
00067 
00068 private:
00069     boost::posix_time::ptime start_; 
00070 };
